/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the gray of the buildings.
